Name: Death Race
Des: Upon the death of a team member or an enemy, all the remaining units on the battlefield gain 20% DMG and lose 20% DMG Reduction.

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of Extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Don't Cross the Line I
Des: Units will receive massive DOT after leaving the light circle.

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of Extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Persistent Battle
Des: Enemy and ally HP doubles, and DMG decreases by 50%

Name: Signal Disruption
Des: Dodging consumes 1 Signal Orb. Each 3-Ping grants 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Deus Ex Machina
Des: When an enemy or a team member takes lethal DMG, they will not die immediately. Instead, they receive a shield equal to their max HP, which continuously decays.

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of Extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Consolidated Frontline
Des: Enemies will share the damage they receive evenly to all enemies.

Name: Life Drain
Des: Restores HP equal to 10% of Max HP every time an enemy deals damage.

Name: Flame Storm
Des: Periodically summons a random Flame Storm on the battlefield, dealing DMG equal to 10% of max HP to enemies and team members.

Name: As One
Des: "Each 3-Ping will increase Basic Attack DMG by 120% and reduce 3-Ping DMG by 20%. (Can stack up to 5 times.)"

Name: Life Drain
Des: Restores HP equal to 10% of Max HP every time an enemy deals damage.

Des: Dodging consumes 1 Signal Orb. Each 3-Ping grants 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Final Radiance
Des: Upon your characters or enemies receiving lethal damage, they immediately restore full HP, gain huge movement speed and all DMG at the cost of losing 10% of Max HP every second.

Name: Emergency Evasion I
Des: A Deconstructor appears on the battlefield and throws a dart at your team every 15s. Unit hit will be frozen for 2s and will lose 30% HP after being hit 3 times.

Des: Enemies will ignore Matrix and receives 50% extra DMG in Matrix

Des: Upon your characters or enemies receiving lethal damage, they immediately restore full HP, gain huge movement speed and all DMG at the cost of losing 10% of Max HP every second.

Name: Quick Battle
Des: All units have 999% more ATK and will immediately resurrect upon death. Each resurrection will grant 10-second Invincibility, which will last 1s less every time the corresponding unit takes 1 attack. Interval: 1s. Max Resurrections: 3.

Name: Freeze Force Field
Des: Enemies will ignore Matrix and receives 50% extra DMG in Matrix

Name: Energy Conversion
Des: Dodge restores 50% faster, and movement speed reduces by 30%.

Des: Dodging consumes 1 Signal Orb. Each 3-Ping grants 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Frequency Block
Des: Basic Attacks will not grant Signal Orbs. Dodging grants one Signal Orb at a time.

Name: Four Trials
Des: Only Signal Orb and Basic Attack DMG can kill the target. Upon death, the target will resurrect with full HP, become immune to the lethal DMG type [Red Orb, Yellow Orb, Blue Orb, Basic Attack], and take 30% more damage (stacks). Max Resurrections: 3.

Name: Red Orb Burst
Des: Casting Red Orb skills will summon lightning strikes, dealing you DMG equal to 10% of your max HP upon hit.

Name: Yellow Orb Burst
Des: Casting Yellow Orb skills will summon lightning strikes, dealing you DMG equal to 10% of your max HP upon hit

Name: Blue Orb Burst
Des: Casting Blue Orb skills will summon lightning strikes, dealing you DMG equal to 10% of your max HP upon hit.

Des: Units will receive massive DOT after leaving the light circle. Every 15s, 2 Polar Soldiers will appear, ram your team, and disappear afterward.

Name: Unstable Polarity
Des: All enemies are immune to damage by 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Last Ditch
Des: Your team gains Super Armor but only the starter character will be deployed to battle.

Des: Upon the death of a team member or an enemy, all the remaining units on the battlefield gain 20% DMG and lose 20% DMG Reduction.

Des: Enemies inflict HP Deterioration on the targets upon dealing damage to them, which will make them lose 3% of Max HP every second. This effect lasts permanently.

Des: Enemies will share the damage they receive evenly to all enemies.

Des: Only Signal Orb and Basic Attack DMG can kill the target. Upon death, the target will resurrect with full HP, become immune to the lethal DMG type [Red Orb, Yellow Orb, Blue Orb, Basic Attack], and take 30% more damage (stacks). Max Resurrections: 3.

Des: Enemies will ignore Matrix and receives 50% extra DMG in Matrix

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of Extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Chromatic Synchronization
Des: Attacking the enemy with <color=#34aff9>a same-colored orb</color> causes Color Burst in the area, <color=#34aff9>knocking away</color> the enemy and immediately generating 3 orbs of the same color.

Name: Lightning Duel
Des: The enemy has <color=#34aff9>high Resistance</color> but will <color=#34aff9>die immediately</color> if knocked onto the lightning coil located near the map border.

Name: Storm Assault
Des: The enemy uses <color=#34aff9>the selected moves</color> at an extremely high frequency.

Name: Enhanced Structure
Des: Some of the enemy's moves have <color=#34aff9>additional attack effects</color>.

Name: Deadly Confrontation
Des: Character's ATK and HP become fixed. The player must choose one <color=#34aff9>self-limitation or one enhancement for the enemy</color>.

Name: Entangled Destiny
Des: The enemy gains <color=#34aff9>high Resistance</color> and inflicts the character with threads <color=#34aff9>debuff</color> on hit.

Name: Fast and Furious
Des: Avoiding an enemy attack with <color=#34aff9>Extreme Dodge</color> deals high <color=#34aff9>Counterattack DMG</color> to them and restores Dodge Gauge.

Name: Annihilating Command
Des: The player can <color=#34aff9>only deploy one character</color> in this challenge. When Luna attacks, she <color=#34aff9>summons specific enemies that</color> hunt down the character.

Name: Faster Orb Recovery
Des: Gains Signal Orb(s) at intervals.

Name: Weakness Resistance
Des: Enemy gains 20% <color=#00b48a>corresponding Elemental Weakness</color> and 10% <color=#B14722>other Elemental Resistances</color>. Victory after defeat of 5 enemies.

Name: Fixed Stats
Des: Character's <color=#00b48a>initial HP</color> is fixed to 1000 and <color=#00b48a>ATK</color> is fixed to 10. <color=#00b48a>CUB's ATK</color> is fixed to 10.

Name: Summon Attacks Reduce Resistance
Des: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>20% Resistance</color> and loses 30% Resistance when <color=#00b48a>attacked by a summon</color>.

Name: Same-Color Attacks Trigger Special Status
Des: Enemy has a color by default and has <color=#B14722>50% more Resistance</color>. When receiving <color=#00b48a>damage of the same color</color>, reduces 13s, during which time triggers 44444 AOE DMG if <color=#00b48a>attacked</color>.

Name: DMG Upon Dodge
Des: <color=#00b48a>Extreme Dodge</color> deals 777777 True DMG to enemies and restores 500 Dodge Gauge and 1500 HP, but enemies <color=#B14722>are no longer affected by Matrix</color>.

Name: Dodge Recovery
Des: Dodge Gauge <color=#00b48a>recovers 200% faster</color>. Enemies gain <color=#B14722>Super Armor</color> and <color=#B14722>10% increased Resistance</color>.

Name: QTE and Shield Break Upon Deployment
Des: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Shield</color> equal to 10% of Max HP every 5s. Removes the effect when taking <color=#00b48a>QTE DMG</color> or <color=#00b48a>Deployment DMG</color>.

Name: Fast Speed
Des: <color=#00b48a>QTE CD</color> drops 2s. <color=#00b48a>Character Switch CD</color> drops by 5s.
